thread.title: eTax 2015 download link fixed, MyTax, MyGov still not working
thread.title_full: eTax 2015 download link fixed, MyTax, MyGov still not working

author: FRANK CHUNG
title: eTax 2015 download link fixed, MyTax, MyGov still not working
text:
YOU had one job, ATO.
It seems an entire year hasn‚Äôt been enough for the Australian Taxation Office to prepare its online systems, which appear to have collapsed under the weight of traffic, leaving users unable to lodge their tax returns.
Many users who have been unable to access MyTax and MyGov since Wednesday turned to social media to express their frustration.
As of 10.30 AEST Thursday, both systems were experiencing difficulties, although a link to download the 2015 eTax program has now been updated after confusion yesterday.
A spokesman for the ATO told news.com.au : ‚ÄúWe‚Äôve been working through the night to resolve our systems issues and apologise for any inconvenience. We‚Äôll be keeping the community updated through social media.‚Äù
@ato_gov_au @N8d0gg7 it's 925pm ... still experiencing technical issues. So unacceptable üò®
‚Äî Richwell Hizon (@Richw3ll) July 2, 2015 surge in traffic to ATO website on July 1 'likely' due to end of financial year pic.twitter.com/wqtN5xkjOP
‚Äî abraham and You (@pleasedontatme) July 2, 2015 Online lodgements are coming in, but our systems are running slow. Looking for mytax or e-tax? Visit https://t.co/gXB3YSrLOL
‚Äî ato.gov.au (@ato_gov_au) July 2, 2015
Our systems are still running a little slow. We‚Äôre working to fix as a priority & will provide another update @ 4:30pm AEST
‚Äî ato.gov.au (@ato_gov_au) July 2, 2015
We‚Äôve worked through the night to implement a system fix. There's still ongoing issues which we're working on. We'll let you know more soon.
‚Äî ato.gov.au (@ato_gov_au) July 2, 2015
We are still experiencing some systems issues. We're working to resolve this as quickly as possible & apologise for any inconvenience.
‚Äî ato.gov.au (@ato_gov_au) July 1, 2015 @ato_gov_au Really? pic.twitter.com/rdl22yb5sT
‚Äî peita (@peitaballerina) July 2, 2015
On Facebook, users reported glitches using eTax. ‚ÄúI‚Äôve been trying for two days to log into my account, which tells me my passwords are wrong,‚Äù one person wrote.
‚ÄúI‚Äôve then tried several times to create a new account and I still cannot get into it. What is the point in creating this online portal when you cannot even access it? Get your stuff sorted ‚Äî it‚Äôs bloody frustrating!‚Äù
Quote: : ‚ÄúI have started to lodge through eTax but it won‚Äôt input/prefill data from my HECS and other things due to the ATO website being down, which will impact my outcome. Not sure it is worth my time to continue.‚Äù
@N8d0gg7 Phone us on 13 28 61 Option 5 between 8am and 10pm (local time) Monday to Friday, and between 10am and 4pm (local time), Saturday
‚Äî ato.gov.au (@ato_gov_au) July 2, 2015
